text: Thomas Kopache (born October 17, 1945) is an American actor. He was born in Manchester, New Hampshire.Thomas Kopache Biography (1945â€“) He is known for his roles as Assistant Secretary of State Bob Slatterly in The West Wing and for roles in the Star Trek franchise. He has also appeared in the stage productions of As You Like It as the banished Duke and in Antigone as Creon. In 2017, Kopache appeared on the HBO show Last Week Tonight with John Oliver as the "Catheter Cowboy", a character based on a commercial that aired on networks such as Fox News. The character appears on commercials produced by Oliver which airs on Fox to educate President Donald Trump. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:People from Manchester, New Hampshire
title: Thomas Kopache
